Title: The Asthenic Syndrome
Writer: Aleksandr Chernykh, Kira Muratova, Sergei Popov
Actors: Olga Antonova, Sergei Popov, Galina Zakhurdaeva, Natalya Buzko
Plot: In the old days it was called hypochrondria, or black melancholia. Now, apparently, it's termed the Asthenic Syndrome. Whatever it is, Nikolai, a teacher of epicly indifferent pupils, has got it, and it's not much fun. Worse yet, quite a few other people, even an entire society, seem to be afflicted with the same problem writ extremely large...
